1194080.description:
What is Localizor?

Localizor is a revolutionary translation tool that allows game developers to have their game translated by their own or other players on the Steam platform.

Together we make the best translations

We use a unique and groundbreaking voting system that motivates contributors into proofreading already submitted translations and vote for the correct ones. Our translations might not be correct from the beginning, but we will get it perfect at the end!

Achievements, prestige points and privileges

We reward players who put a good effort into translating games. Every time someone votes for one of your translation suggestions you'll earn prestige points and complete achievements. As you gain more points, you'll unlock more privileges on our system.

No annoying signup process

Localizor is built for game developers and players. We won't annoy you with stupid questions like what your email is. As long as you use our Steam client you're ready to go right away.
